item.title: Facilitating large language model Russian adaptation with Learned Embedding Propagation
item.description: Researchers introduce Learned Embedding Propagation (LEP), a novel technique that efficiently adapts large language models (LLMs) to new languages using minimal training data, thus overcoming limitati…
